name: Yuushun no Mon
nutshell:
Super jockey of local horse racing, Mitsuyuma challenges the triple crown race of central horse racing with local horses !! Great power full-scale horse racing romance !!
-Translated from akitashoten

name: Gakusou
nutshell:
A young craftsman meets the daughter of a painter he admired.
(Source: Lovely Strange Dark)

name: Kaleido Star Official Fanbook
nutshell: Fanarts and manga pages by various fans and mangaka.

name: Sex Pistols
nutshell: People are starting to act very odd around Norio. This average, normal boy is suddenly getting a lot of unwanted romantic attention and he can’t figure out why! A broken leg and a fall down the stairs into the arms of a handsome stranger set off the beginnings of an explanation, and it is one Norio never could have possibly imagined. Soon a whole new world opens up for Norio, revealing a secret society of special people evolved from animals other than monkeys. This society has a complex structure and its members are ranked by rarity and desirability, and it turns out that Norio is a particularly rare breed and his DNA is in much demand! How will he survive in this modern jungle where he’s suddenly the prey?

name: Kanojo wa Kanno Shosetsuka
nutshell: Yearning for the world of erotic novels, Shiina Keisuke triumphantly joins the business as an editor. The author he yearns to work with is Kuroki Chihiro, however everyone is afraid of her because she is a devil to work for.

name: Magickology
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Fantasy,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: Cecily goes to a prestigious wizarding school and is obsessed with her brother.

name: Tokimeke Mahou Youjo Kokopure
nutshell: Spin-off of Onee-san wa Joshi Shougakusei ni Kyoumi ga arimasu. Same degeneracy, but with magical girls.

name: Song of Youth Series
nutshell: Silent oneshot, from Garo 1966-06.

name: AandD
nutshell: A slice of life centred around an angel and devil who secretly get along. Mainly heartwarming and sometimes serious.

name: Grand Lingerie
nutshell: Yui, a girl who loves panties, gets wrapped up in battles using powerful underwear. Yui receives special striped underpants that give her powers.

name: Maou Gakuen no Hangyakusha
nutshell:
Yuuto is an ordinary high school boy who, one day, notices a mysterious tarot card by his bed. He shows it to his parents, who give him the good news - as the son of demonkin, he is eligible to become the next Demon Lord. As such, Yuuto is soon brought to a demonic academy in order to improve his devilish skills and earn the title of demon lord. And, you know, get a harem along the way.
From the author of Masou Gakuen HxH and Ecstas Online.

name: Outer Zone
nutshell: A Twilight Zone/Outer Limits-esque romp through the occult and supernatural led by your elven-eared hostess, Misery.

name: Eques
nutshell: To protect the earth from the "eques" and save the human race from an alien menace, the young Akira has to fight to the death. Even if that requires sacrifices…

name: Ore ga XX de Model Debut!?
nutshell: Koutarou Asama wants to be a model, and he's overjoyed when his older sister presents him with a modeling opportunity. However, he soon discovers that he's been scouted as a cross-dressing model.

name: Hidamari no Ki
nutshell:
Edo, 1855, in the Hill of the Three Hundred district: Japan's isolationist foreign policy has been lifted, and the era of the Bakumatsu has begun.
The samurai Ibuya Manjiro, 26 years old, has just begun his career as low-ranking retainer to the minor daimyo Lord Matsudaira.
Tezuka Ryoan, 29, a disciple of Dutch medicine, has just been accepted as a student at Teki Academy in Osaka.
Each has a temper to go with his talent, and in a time of brewing upheaval the two are not slow to find trouble, which brings them together in spite of their mutual dislike.
(from: MU)


Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 1984


Volumes 326-336 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works

name: Dear Society
nutshell: A hidden youth depicted by an LGBT creator. Some 10 years or so ago, a high school student from a regional town named Rino Tachi went to an all-girls school, studied here and there, and enjoyed talking with his female friends. He was an "ordinary" girl, except for his pervasive feeling of unease within his body. A story of "love" set in a time that demanded even more conformity than now, about living one's fullest life while hiding the discontent. A story about searching for oneself.

name: True Love
nutshell: Ai just loves her big brother, Yuzuru! He's so kind, so reliable and so cool! He always protects Ai from trouble and when she cries, he cheers her up! He's the perfect big brother. But, bad things happen soon. Her parents divorce and she and her brother are separated! Now, after 9 years, one day, Ai, now 14 years old, finds a tall boy in front of her school! Who is this boy-?

name: Kiratto! Yell
nutshell: Yuuto enters his all-boy junior-high with the hope of joining a manly cheering squad, but is surprised to find all the boys in the club dressed as girls.

name: Sweet Home
nutshell: A story about a cohabiting couple near their thirties.

name: Super School Doctor
nutshell: In order to fullfill his grandfather's dying wishes, Xiong Yu returns to China to marry a beautiful school principal Qiu Hongxin, but was rejected when she meets him as she has no feelings for him. In order for her to develop those feelings, Xiong Yu decided to become a Chinese medical doctor in the school. Now the peach is truly blossoming.

name: Orca
nutshell:
What would you do if your world was going to end? Park Jin Ki, a high-school student, was on a holiday with his friend when he saw a crack on the sky. Little did he know, that it was just the beginning of the world’s destruction.

Raws : http://www.webtoons.com/challenge/episodeList?titleNo=3851

name: Your Majesty, You Cant!
tags: Reincarnation,Official Colored,Historical,Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,Drama,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: Others have an awesome reincarnation such as becoming a king or war general. But me? Why was I reincarnated as a treacherous prime minister that brings calamity to people and betrays their country?! It’s terrifying you know, seeing how heads roll because of what the king said! “Is there anything you’re dissatisfied with?” said the king with a pursed smile.Trembling He Lanzi replied, “No your majesty, this prime minister wouldn't dare.”. “You’re acting distant like this, because you actually want me to...” “No your majesty, please don’t !“ Blackhearted Younger Emperor X Beautiful Scholarly Tyrant Prime Minister.

name: Jupiter ~THE iDOLM@STER~
nutshell: Part of THE iDOLM@STER series.

name: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha - Futarigoto (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A doujinshi about teenage Nanoha and Fate sharing some time together after school, in a situation that derives in a sweet make out session.

name: Sly Cooper: Phantom Thief
nutshell: Goofy goods-gaffling escapades with the PlayStation 2's thieving raccoon.

name: Crimson Yuri Party
nutshell: "Let's do something cool and guild-like." A fluffy, comedic 4-Koma about an adventure guild lead by four useless girls who are wholly unprepared to achieve their goals!

name: Exorcist Zhong Kui
nutshell: After killing many monsters, Zhong Kui and his apprentice Qin Shuang found a bizarre connection between these monsters and their some odd setup. Finally they find out that someone is trying to set up an this kind of array in the capital.

name: Teasing After School
nutshell:

Artist's pixiv
